====Quik====.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/avelino/quik.png?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/avelino/quik :alt: Build Status - Travis CIA fast and lightweight Python template engineFeatures--------- Easy to use.- High performance.- Autoescaping.- Template inheritance.- Supports native python expressions.Nutshell--------Here a small example of a Quik template.. code-block:: html
    #for @user in @users: #if @user.age > 18:
  • @user.username
    • #end #end
Use It------Render via template:.. code-block:: python from quik import FileLoader loader = FileLoader('html') template = loader.load_template('index.html') print template.render({'author': 'Thiago Avelino'}, loader=loader).encode('utf-8')
